name: Pico de Gallo
description: This recipe is a classic pico de gallo preparation with the exception of the inclusion of two types of spicy chiles, jalapeño and serrano. Their flavors are so different: Jalapeños are much more vegetal and can lean into bell pepper and poblano flavors, while serranos are much sharper, crisp and almost cucumber-like. They complement each other very well, and are used in many Mexican salsas. Serve pico de gallo with empanadas de chipilín or on the side with your favorite tacos or grilled meats.
recipeCategory: easy, quick, condiments, dips and spreads
keywords: cilantro, jalapeño, plum tomato, serrano, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup cilantro leaves and tender stems, finely chopped
1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, plus more as needed
1 1/2 teaspoons kosher salt (such as Diamond Crystal)

recipeInstructions.text: Gently toss tomatoes, cilantro, onion, jalapeño, serrano, garlic and 1 tablespoon lime juice in a small bowl; season with salt and more lime juice if necessary. Let sit, uncovered, to let flavors meld, about 10 minutes.
